title: What are some examples of mathematics in music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Music is based on our physiological perception of sounds and general ability to generate models of the world. There’s a very thorough scientific article on the subject - Harmony Explained: Simple example of applied and straightforward Math in music is guitar frets location calculation.

You can play the digits of pi, in fact many people have, it is in fact beautiful. Moreover, all of music can be spoken of in terms of numbers. If you are interested in this, check out the circle of fifths. It may not be as heavy as you are looking for in terms of math, but it’ll be interesting for sure if you haven’t seen it before.
